question:
The Bahamani sultanate was divided into which of the following states?
1) Nizam Shahis of Ahmadnagar,
2) Adil Shahis of Bijapur
3) Qutb Shahis of Golconda
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
After c.1518 CE, the Sultanate broke up into five states:
1) The Nizam Shahis of Ahmadnagar
2) The Adil Shahis of Bijapur
3) The Qutb Shahis of Golconda
4) The Imad Shahis of Berar
5) The Barid Shahis of Bidar
which are collectively known as the “Deccan Sultanates”.
